Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Aging

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the creation of an online public searchable database of social adult day cares registered in the city
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creation of an online public searchable database of social adult day cares registered in the city.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to supplemental nutrition assistance program enrollment and recertification for seniors
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Supplemental nutrition assistance program enrollment and recertification for seniors.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Department for the Aging to restore the congregate weekend meal program and conduct a public awareness campaign to promote congregate and home delivered meals.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Dept for the Aging to restore the congregate weekend meal program and conduct a public awareness campaign to promote congregate and home delivered meals.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Department for the Aging to ensure that halal meals are available as part of the home delivered meals program.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Dept for the Aging to ensure that halal meals are available as part of the home delivered meals program.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to significantly increase funding for the New York State Long-Term Care Ombudsman Program
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign A.2743, in relation to violations of safety conditions in adult care facilities
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Violations of safety conditions in adult care facilities. (A.2743)
